actions.Multiattack: The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Spit Acid: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (4d4) acid damage.
